scenario.context: You are the Head of Business Development at DataFlow, a B2B SaaS company. TechVentures Inc. sent you a partnership proposal last week suggesting a co-marketing arrangement where they would integrate your product into their platform and promote it to their customers. However, after internal discussions, your team has decided the partnership doesn't align with your current strategic priorities. TechVentures is a well-connected company in your industry, and you've met their BD director at several conferences.
scenario.request: Write an email declining the partnership proposal from TechVentures Inc.

judge_criteria: Diplomatic language that doesn't burn bridges
Provides business rationale without being subjective or hurtful
Leaves door open for potential future opportunities
Acknowledges strengths of proposal before declining
